title: Developing Social Problem-Solving Competencies Through Constructivist Adaptive Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: University-linked program operated as part of corporate social contribution initiatives, designed for learners to explore various social issues and experience collaborative problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three solutions for social issues by leveraging their own experiences and prior knowledge in accordance with constructivist principles
Learners conduct at least one collaborative project analyzing social issues from multiple perspectives based on cognitive flexibility
Learners reconstruct learning content using digital tools (BYOD) and complete individual/team portfolios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
